dmca.title: Artist Complains to Google of Unauthorized Screening
dmca.body:
09/27/2002 FRI 04:11 FAX GOOGLE INC                                   001/004
    
                CURRUMBIN STUDIO

              Google, Inc.
              Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
              [Private]
              Mountain View, CA 94043
              
	      Dear Sir/Madam,

              I would like to file a notice of copyright infringement.

              www.johnlovett.com/colour.htm
    
              2. The material I claim is infringing copyright is listed below followed by the URL of the page I am alleging it infringes
    
              Search united french artists compound colours
